name: Women in Tech Summit
description: The Perspektywy Women in Tech Summit 2026 - the most empowering, energetic, inspiring, and boldest event in Europe and Asia for women in STEM, Tech & IT - will take place on 10 and 11 June 2026 in Warsaw! We can’t wait to meet you in person.

name: 2025 Games for Change Festival
description: Drawing inspiration from purposeful design and innovation, the 2025 Games for Change Festival theme is "Designing for Tomorrow". We'll bring together diverse voices from industry veterans to next-generation innovators to explore how games and XR can break down barriers between generations, perspectives, and sectors.

name: MCV/Develop Women In Games Awards
description: The MCV/Develop Women In Games Awards will take place on 25 September 2025. The event will be taking place at the America Square Conference Centre

name: Women In Games Annual Global Conference
description: Our welcoming and inclusive online platform will enable you to join our extensive and growing global community from wherever you are in the world. Join us to  hear our inspiring Conference speakers discussing the multi-layered, evolving trajectory of play in contemporary life.
